body:
Presuming a user knows the block hash of the block containing a given transaction, this PR allows them to fetch the raw transaction, even without `-txindex`. It also enables support for getting transactions that are in orphaned blocks.

```Bash
$ bitcoin-cli getblockhash 462000
00000000000000000217f2c12922e321f6d4aa933ce88005a9a493c503054a40
$ bitcoin-cli getblock 00000000000000000217f2c12922e321f6d4aa933ce88005a9a493c503054a40
{
  "hash": "00000000000000000217f2c12922e321f6d4aa933ce88005a9a493c503054a40",
[...]
  "tx": [
[...]
    "6c66b98191e9d6cc671f6817142152ebf6c5cab2ef008397b5a71ac13255a735",
[...]
  ],
[...]
}
$ bitcoin-cli getrawtransaction 6c66b98191e9d6cc671f6817142152ebf6c5cab2ef008397b5a71ac13255a735 1
error code: -5
error message:
No such mempool transaction. Use -txindex to enable blockchain transaction queries. Use gettransaction for wallet transactions.
$ bitcoin-cli getrawtransaction 00000000000000000217f2c12922e321f6d4aa933ce88005a9a493c503054a40:6c66b98191e9d6cc671f6817142152ebf6c5cab2ef008397b5a71ac13255a735 1
{
  "hex": "0200000004d1575bb357a46794f53b4356965b11074ecbd7e4f0f7229d6cb108a1[...]0c0700",
  "inMainChain": true,
  "txid": "6c66b98191e9d6cc671f6817142152ebf6c5cab2ef008397b5a71ac13255a735",
  "hash": "6c66b98191e9d6cc671f6817142152ebf6c5cab2ef008397b5a71ac13255a735",
  "size": 666,
[...]
}
$ 
```
title: [rpc] Allow fetching tx directly from specified block in getrawtransaction
